item.title: Interview
item.description: Interview Questions They Asked # why don’t you start by telling us a little bit about your career path? Have you done field work as well like monitoring of like the data collection? in terms of the position what what interests you the most, from what you saw the description? what do you consider as your greatest achievement professionally? Any sort of experience that you have with working with external stakeholders that have you?
